ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Profile.Name = 'Salesforce API Only System Integrations' && (TEXT(Origin) != 'Email' && TEXT(Origin) != 'Phone' && TEXT(Origin) != 'WhatsApp' && TEXT(Origin) != 'Instagram' && TEXT(Origin) != 'X' && TEXT(Origin) != 'YouTube' && TEXT(Origin) != 'App Store' && TEXT(Origin) != 'Play Store')
